import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchBar from "../layouts/SearchBar"; import { CardFooter, Button, IconButton } from "@material-tailwind/react"; function Table() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:4000/order/") .then((data) => data.json()) .then((data) => setData(data)) .catch((error) => setData(error)); }, []); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const recordsPerPage = 5; const lastIndex = currentPage * recordsPerPage; const firstIndex = lastIndex - recordsPerPage; const records = data.slice(firstIndex, lastIndex); const npage = Math.ceil(data.length / recordsPerPage); const numbers = [...Array(npage + 1).keys()].slice(1); return (

Voir toutes les commandes

{data.map((item) => ( ))}
Suivi Date Destination Destinataire Paiement Coût Total Statut Statut de la facture
{item.tracking}

{item.date}

{item.destination}

{item.recipient.name}

{item.recipient.phone}

{item.payement}

{item.totalCost}

{item.status == true ? "ok" : "en attente"}

{item.invoiceStatus == true ? "ok" : "Livrée"}

{numbers.map((n, i) => { return ( <> {n} ); })}
); } export default Table;
